comment: The hypothesis of ~ bj-df-cleq . Note that the hypothesis of ~ bj-df-cleq actually has an additional disjoint variable condition on ` x , y ` and therefore is provable by simply using ~ ax-ext in place of ~ axext3 in the current proof. (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
